name: One of
description:
Julian, a youth awakened from the mysterious land, started an exploration to find his memory back.
He encountered more and more mysteries around him, including the changing world and the memories of others. To survive, he must reach out to the truth…

Worldview

A thousand years ago, it was the Middle Ages for swords and magics; a thousand years later, it is a modern world without magics.
The clone men and other prohibited projects are unfolding in the grey zone.

Exploration

Players need to investigate their surroundings and collect various information for driving the plot progress, so there would be many text information.
The game also features riddles, chases and QTE factors.

Character






Memory shard

Players would experience the memories of three characters and control the character of each memory.
But you cannot change the existing facts in these memories.

Follow us
The game is being developed, and thanks for your attention!
Please add the game to your wish list if you are interested.
